page.title: 12A Visit to the Motorway.
page.content: On Thursday, 23rd May 8 of us went to see the M1 Motorway.First we stood on the motorway bridge and started counting cars.I saw 124 cars in ten minutes, so in an hour I would have seen about 744 cars.There were lots of lorries and vans besides.It is a busy road, going northwards to Leeds and southwards to London.There are separate carriageways for traffic travelling in opposite directions.Each carriageway is wide, with three lanes of traffic.The bridge was being repaired because the iron inside was going rusty.There were signs on the motorway to warn the traffic that the bridge was being repaired.
